sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import {
    HeroContainer,
    HeroBg,
    VideoBg,
    ImageBg,
    ArrowForward,
    HeroContent,
    HeroP,
    HeroTitle,
    HeroBtnWrapper,
    ArrowRight, Mockup
} from '../Hero/HeroElements'
import { Button } from '../../Utilities/ButtonElements'
import Video from '../../Videos/video.mp4'
import hero_bg from '../../Images/hero_bg.svg'
import mockup from '../../Images/mockap.jpeg'

const Hero = () => {

    const [hover, setHover] = useState(false);

    const onHover = () => {
        setHover(!hover);
    }

    return (
        <>
            <HeroContainer>
                <HeroBg>
                    {/*<VideoBg autoPlay loop muted src={Video} type='video/mp4' />*/}
                    <ImageBg src={hero_bg} />
                </HeroBg>

                <HeroContent>
                    <HeroTitle>WHEELY IS A WEB 3 APPLICATION</HeroTitle>
                    <HeroP>
                        Users can earn tokens by driving any mode of transport.
                    </HeroP>
                    <HeroP>
                        Whether it's a bike, scooter, car, or even public transportation,
                    </HeroP>
                    <HeroP>
                        you can earn game token.
                    </HeroP>
                    <HeroBtnWrapper>
                        <Button
                            to="signup"
                            onMouseEnter={onHover}
                            onMouseLeave={onHover}
                            primary="true"
                            dark="true"
                        >
                            PRESALE {hover ? <ArrowForward /> : <ArrowRight />}
                        </Button>

                    </HeroBtnWrapper>

                </HeroContent><HeroContent>
                <Mockup src={mockup} />

            </HeroContent>

            </HeroContainer>
        </>
    )
}

export default Hero
